resume: I’m a data scientist with 12+ years of experience. I worked in image processing and software development for Galderma R&D (Nestlé Skin Health), European projects, Airbus, Inria, Institut Curie and Universities. Each of my experiences gave rise to patents or scientific publications.

items.content: Digital product design with business product owners
Data workflow disign and prototyping
R&D teams’ synchronization
Quality assessment of the data analysis models
Project with Airbus: Development of machine learning image processing algorithms for low photon rate image reconstruction
Project with EIT-Digital: Development of machine learning algorithms for connected wearable devices
Project with Institut Curie: Development of database and image analysis worflows using Docker for big data analysis

experiences.title: Data Scientist and project managet at Curie Institut

items.content: Development of an open source bio-image management and analysis solutions: BioImage-IT
Development of image analysis algorithms
Wrapping image analysis tools (c/c++, java, matlab) to biological image analysis softwares (Fiji, Icy, jupyter notebooks...)
Data management
Machine learning, deep learning
Participation to the training group of France-BioImaging
Management of a new image processing facility for microscopy facilities of Rennes, Nantes and Roscoff (France)
Daily image analysis consultations
Image processing training
Data storage & management on servers
Development of Platform-Manager, an open-source facility management web application used by about 30 facilities: http://bgo-bioimagerie.github.io/platformmanager/
5 publications
Implementation of an image processing software (C++/Qt) github.com/sylvainprigent
Collaboration with a prospect company
Director: Florence Besse
Develop an image processing framework for detecting and Tracking axons in drosophila brain using bi-photon microscopy imaging
